code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import backendURL from"../components/config";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Homeservices=()=>{const[services,setServices]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const fetchServices=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("".concat(backendURL,"/api/services"));setServices(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching services:",error);}};fetchServices();},[]);const handleServiceClick=id=>{navigate("/services/".concat(id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"services-title",children:"Our Services"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"services-container",children:services.map(service=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"service-card",onClick:()=>handleServiceClick(service.id),style:{cursor:"pointer"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:service.image,alt:service.name,className:"service-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"service-title",children:service.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"service-description",children:service.description})]},service.id))})]});};export default Homeservices;
